snippet.title: The Bazaar - Official Trailer | OTK Games Expo 2024
snippet.description: Check out the trailer for The Bazaar, an upcoming Hero Builder game developed by Tempo. The Bazaar's founder's pack grants access to the close beta coming October 2024. Set in a vibrant, ever-changing galactic marketplace, players assume a role from a roster of unique heroes, trading and upgrading otherworldly items & skills to assemble them into a plethora of combinations used to outplay and defeat opponents.
